name: Everyday is More
description:
You want to get some Milk, but something bad happens...
It seems like you'll have to silence soon-to-be gossipers.

New witnesses keep seeing you, just like... Just like they'd want you to keep it goin'.

Controls:

  • A/Q - Go left
  • D - Go right
  • Space - Hide and go back to the menu screen (from the win screen)
  • Touch the 'witnesses' to kill them
  • Touch the cops to die

Game made is about 2 or 3 days for the Bolt Jam 9 by someone who may be using too many 'if' statements.
